overview: When Jonathan and his stunning girlfriend discover some old film in their attic, the excitement of their discovery soon turns to shock when they realize that the faded celluloid contains very explicit footage of the famous sex goddess, Marilee.  They soon realize that the sexy footage is worth thousands of dollars on the black market and they enlist the help of Jonathon's mobster cousin Tony, to sell the most sought after sleazy film in Hollywood's history.
title: Illegally Buxom Blonde
